channel.title: Wtf, am I being hacked or something?
channel.description: This is really wierd, yesterday I downloaded Microsofts latest updates, (the Genuine thing) and my IE stopped working properly. When I go to check my email at hotmail, it says I'm not using IE and shuts down, and If I use IE for 30min+ it shuts down itself. Wtf is happening? I have real windows, no copys or anything and using IE 7.0.

item.title: Wtf, am I being hacked or something?
item.dc:creator: @wolfpack81 wolfpack81
item.description:
@wolfpack81 wrote:

http://www.processlibrary.com/processscan/

Read full topic

allright, good luck finding the naughty process(es)

item.title: Wtf, am I being hacked or something?
item.dc:creator: @The_Cursed The Cursed
item.description:
@The_Cursed wrote:

like for example i have a process called : jusched.exe
Now go to Google and type in the name of the process : “jusched.exe” (without the quotes)
Then you’ll get a lot of information of the process
Do this with every process untill you find a process that is a virus or any other process that harms your computer then search the location of the process and delete it

OR

you could simply download an anti-virus program and do a complete scan

Read full topic
item.source: Wtf, am I being hacked or something?

item.title: Wtf, am I being hacked or something?
item.dc:creator: @Eh_Pretty_Easy Eh Pretty Easy
item.description:
@Eh_Pretty_Easy wrote:

How do I know which processes are suspicious? I’m not familiar with them, but I can see those programs which I already know that are safe. Like 90% of the other processes are unknown to me.

Read full topic
